| [Exercise 2: Examining fastQ files](https://jhudatascience.org/GDSCN_Book_SARS_Galaxy_on_AnVIL/student-activity-guide.html#exercise-one-examining-fastq-files-in-galaxy) | 30 minutes | 10 minutes |
| [Exercise 3: Aligning data](https://jhudatascience.org/GDSCN_Book_SARS_Galaxy_on_AnVIL/student-activity-guide.html#exercise-two) | 30 minutes | 10 minutes |
| [Exercise 4: Viewing alignments](https://jhudatascience.org/GDSCN_Book_SARS_Galaxy_on_AnVIL/student-activity-guide.html#exercise-three-viewing-aligned-data) | 30 minutes | 10 minutes |
